snippet: Tickets and corporate contributions brought in $30 million. Listeners made pledges that are now being tallied. More is expected when the concert is rebroadcast Thursday night in Europe.
abstract: Tickets and corporate contributions brought in $30 million. Listeners made pledges that are now being tallied. More is expected when the concert is rebroadcast Thursday night in Europe.

headline.main: Concert Organizers Still Tallying Sandy-Relief Donations
